additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Sodium Bicarbonate, Citric Acid, Sodium Sulfate, PEG-400, Fragrance, May contain CI42090, CI17200

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: SAFETY: Use under adult supervision. For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. In the event of contact with eyes, rinse immediately with plenty of clean water. If irritation occurs discontinue use. ADVISORY: Product may stain certain surfaces such as porous tiles, unsealed grout and old chipped baths. Test a small area first. Clean tub and tile area after use. Remove all packaging from bath bomb before use.

description: Frozen Fizz N Scrub contains of soft fabric Bath Scrubby & 150g Bath Bomb.
name: Fizz And Scrub
